name: Cup of Relationship
description: Seven-card spread for deep relationship insight and guidance

positions.label: Your Perspective
positions.description: Your current feelings and perspective on the relationship

positions.label: Relationship Foundation
positions.description: The foundation and core of your connection

positions.label: Challenge
positions.description: Current challenge or obstacle in the relationship

positions.label: Strength
positions.description: What's working well and supporting the relationship

positions.label: Guidance
positions.description: What you both need to know or do

instructions: Focus on a specific relationship (romantic, friendship, family)
Draw cards for both perspectives first
Place the foundation card in the center

interpretation.overview: The Cup of Relationship spread offers balanced insight into any relationship, showing multiple perspectives and clear guidance.
tips: Compare the two perspective cards for understanding
The foundation card reveals the relationship's core nature
Balance the challenge and strength cards for complete insight
The guidance card is crucial for relationship growth
Remember that outcomes can change based on your actions
